mapper.select: select facilityNo,typeName,facilityName,address,telnumber,latitude,longitude,eavaluationResult,totalScore from (select wel.facilityNo, wel.typeName, wel.facilityName, wel.address, wel.telnumber, wel.latitude, wel.longitude ,wel.eavaluationResult, wel.TOTALSCORE, rownum "RNUM" from (select w.facilityNo,w.typeName,w.facilityName,w.address,w.telnumber,w.latitude,w.longitude,w.eavaluationResult, (s.ManageScore + s.SafetyScore + s.AssureScore + s.ProcessScore +s.ResultScore) "TOTALSCORE" from welfareFacilities w, welfareFacilityScore s where w.facilityNo = s.facilityNo and w.typeName Like '%주야간보호%' order by "TOTALSCORE" desc) wel) where RNUM <=5
select facilityNo,typeName,facilityName,address,telnumber,latitude,longitude,eavaluationResult from welfarefacilities where typeName Like '%주야간보호%'

select facilityNo,typeName,facilityName,address,telnumber,latitude,longitude from welfarefacilities where typeName Like '%주야간보호%' and latitude between #{swLat} and #{neLat} and longitude between #{swLng} and #{neLng}

select facilityNo,typeName,facilityName,address,telnumber,latitude,longitude from welfarefacilities where typeName Like '방문간호' and latitude between #{swLat} and #{neLat} and longitude between #{swLng} and #{neLng}

select facilityNo,typeName,facilityName,address,telnumber,latitude,longitude from welfarefacilities where typeName Like '방문요양' and latitude between #{swLat} and #{neLat} and longitude between #{swLng} and #{neLng}

select facilityNo,typeName,facilityName,address,telnumber,latitude,longitude,eavaluationResult,totalScore from (select wel.facilityNo, wel.typeName, wel.facilityName, wel.address, wel.telnumber, wel.latitude, wel.longitude ,wel.eavaluationResult, wel.TOTALSCORE, rownum "RNUM" from (select w.facilityNo,w.typeName,w.facilityName,w.address,w.telnumber,w.latitude,w.longitude,w.eavaluationResult, (s.ManageScore + s.SafetyScore + s.AssureScore + s.ProcessScore +s.ResultScore) "TOTALSCORE" from welfareFacilities w, welfareFacilityScore s where w.facilityNo = s.facilityNo and w.typeName = '방문간호' order by "TOTALSCORE" desc) wel) where RNUM <=5

select facilityNo,typeName,facilityName,address,telnumber,latitude,longitude,eavaluationResult,totalScore from (select wel.facilityNo, wel.typeName, wel.facilityName, wel.address, wel.telnumber, wel.latitude, wel.longitude ,wel.eavaluationResult, wel.TOTALSCORE, rownum "RNUM" from (select w.facilityNo,w.typeName,w.facilityName,w.address,w.telnumber,w.latitude,w.longitude,w.eavaluationResult, (s.ManageScore + s.SafetyScore + s.AssureScore + s.ProcessScore +s.ResultScore) "TOTALSCORE" from welfareFacilities w, welfareFacilityScore s where w.facilityNo = s.facilityNo and w.typeName = '방문요양' order by "TOTALSCORE" desc) wel) where RNUM <=5

select w.facilityNo, w.typeName, w.eavaluationResult, w.facilityName, w.peopleLimit, w.peopleNow, w.peopleMargin, w.peopleWait, w.telnumber, w.address, w.supplyService, w.latitude, w.longitude, f.staffTotal, f.director, f.general, f.socialWorker, f.doctor, f.contractDoctor, f.nurse, f.nurseAside, f.dentalist, f.careWorker1st, f.careWorker2nd, f.careWorker3rd, f.physicalTherapist, f.occupationalTherapist, f.officer, f.nutritionist, f.cook, f.cleanliness, f.keeper, f.assitant, f.others, s.evaluateDate, s.evaluateGrade, s.manageScore, s.safetyScore, s.assureScore, s.processScore, s.resultScore FROM welfarefacilities w, welfareFacilityScore s, welfareFacilityStaff f, facilityReview r WHERE w.FACILITYNO = #{facilityNo} and w.facilityNo = f.facilityNo and w.facilityNo = s.facilityNo
select revNo, u_id, rdate, content, score from facilityReview where facilityNo = #{facilityNo}

select u_no,u_id,u_name ,'19'||to_date(u_birth,'yy-mm-dd') "u_birth" ,decode(subStr(u_birth2,1,1),'1','남성','3','남성','여성') "u_gender" ,floor(to_number(sysdate-to_date(decode(substr(u_birth2,1,1),'1','19','2','19','20')||to_date(u_birth,'yy-mm-dd')))/365) "u_age" ,u_phone,u_email,u_addr1||' '||u_addr2 "u_addr" from U_MEMBER where u_no = #{u_no}
mapper.insert: insert into reservationInfo VALUES((select nvl(max(resNo),0)+1 from reservationInfo),#{facilityNO} ,#{facilityName},#{u_no},#{userName},#{userAge},to_date(#{resDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),#{resTime}, #{visitPurpose})
mapper.update: update reservationInfo set resDate= to_date(#{resDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), resTime = #{resTime}, visitPurpose = #{visitPurpose} where resNO = #{resNo}
mapper.select: select r.resNO, w.typeName, r.facilityName, w.address, w.telnumber, r.userName, to_char(r.resDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') "resDate", r.resTime, r.visitPurpose from reservationInfo r, welfareFacilities w, U_MEMBER u where r.u_no = #{u_no} and r.u_no = u.u_no and r.facilityNO = w.facilityNo

select r.resNo, r.facilityName, r.facilityNO, w.typeName, w.address, w.telnumber, r.userName, r.visitPurpose, decode(substr(u_birth2,1,1),'1','19','2','19','20')||to_date(u.u_birth,'yy-mm-dd') "u_birth", floor(to_number(sysdate-to_date(decode(substr(u_birth2,1,1),'1','19','2','19','20')||to_date(u.u_birth,'yy-mm-dd')))/365) "u_age", u.u_addr1||' '||u.u_addr2 "u_addr", u_phone, decode(subStr(u.u_birth2,1,1),'1','남성','3','남성','여성') "u_gender", r.u_no from reservationInfo r, welfareFacilities w, U_MEMBER u where r.resNo = #{resNo} and r.facilityNO = w.facilityNO and r.u_no = u.u_no
mapper.insert: insert into facilityReview values((select nvl(max(revNo),0)+1 from facilityReview),#{facilityNo},#{facilityName},#{u_no},#{u_id},#{content},#{score},sysdate)
